text: {{Infobox video game | title = Rodea the Sky Soldier | genre = Wii Uãƒ»3DS: Sky Adventure (Wii version: Flying Action) | platforms = Wii UNintendo 3DS | developer = Wii U,3DS: Kadokawa Games/Prope (Special Wii version: Prope) | publisher = Kadokawa Games | released = "RODEA THE SKY SOLDIER" is a video game released by Kadokawa Games on April 2, 2015.Multi-platform for Wii U and Nintendo 3DS.
